zh-tw.example_info_1: API網址規則：https://廳主端網址/external/路由，以呼叫Token API為例：https://{domain_name}/external/user/token
zh-tw.example_info_2: API認證方式：呼叫平台API時Header需帶入Token參數，Token參數時效為24hrs，超時請重新取得
zh-tw.request_query_string_help: 以Query string方式附加在URL結尾
zh-tw.url_parameter_help: 在路由上以花括號包住的為變數，以取代方式帶入網址

zh-cn.example_info_1: API网址规则：https://厅主端网址/external/路由，以呼叫Token API为例：https://{domain_name}/external/user/token
zh-cn.example_info_2: API认证方式：呼叫平台API时Header需带入Token参数，Token参数时效为24hrs，超时请重新取得
zh-cn.request_query_string_help: 以Query string方式附加在URL结尾
zh-cn.url_parameter_help: 在路由上以花括号包住的为变数，以取代方式带入网址

en.example_info_1: API URL rule: https://Back office URL/external/routing. Call Token API as an example: https://{domain_name}/external/user/token
en.example_info_2: API认证方式：呼叫平台API时Header需带入Token参数，Token参数时效为24hrs，超时请重新取得
en.request_query_string_help: Append query string to the end of URL
en.get_commission_for_example: Take the game rebate group as an example (/game/{lobby}/commission/group)
en.url_parameter_help: Variables are in the curly braces on the route. Bring in the URL by substitution.

ja.example_info_1: API URL rule: https://Back office URL/external/routing. Call Token API as an example: https://{domain_name}/external/user/token
ja.example_info_2: API认证方式：呼叫平台API时Header需带入Token参数，Token参数时效为24hrs，超时请重新取得
ja.request_query_string_help: Append query string to the end of URL
ja.get_commission_for_example: Take the game rebate group as an example (/game/{lobby}/commission/group)
ja.url_parameter_help: Variables are in the curly braces on the route. Bring in the URL by substitution.

ko.example_info_1: API 사이트 주소 규칙：https:// 홀 오너 페이지 사이트 주소 / external / 라우팅，Token API를 호출하는 범례：https://{domain_name}/external/user/token
ko.example_info_2: API认证方式：呼叫平台API时Header需带入Token参数，Token参数时效为24hrs，超时请重新取得
ko.request_query_string_help: Query string 방식으로 URL 끝에 첨부하기
ko.url_parameter_help: 라우팅에 중괄호로 표시한 것은 변수이며 대치 방식으로</br>로 사이트 주소를 대입합니다.

vi.example_info_1: API quy tắc link: https:// trang web chính của chủ nhà / external / định tuyến</br>Dùng gọi Token API ví dụ: https://{domain_name}/external/user/token
vi.example_info_2: API认证方式：呼叫平台API时Header需带入Token参数，Token参数时效为24hrs，超时请重新取得
vi.response_is_json: Định dạng trả về là JSON
vi.request_query_string_help: Dùng phương thức Query string thêm vào đuôi URL
vi.get_commission_for_example: Ví dụ hoàn trả của trò chơi (/game/{lobby}/commission/group)
vi.url_parameter_help: Biến số trong dấu { }, link được đưa vào bằng cách thay thế

th.example_info_1: กติกาการตั้ง API：https:// เว็บห้องโถง / external / ยูอาร์เเอล ใช้ตัวอย่างการเปิด Token API：https://{domain_name}/external/user/token
th.example_info_2: API认证方式：呼叫平台API时Header需带入Token参数，Token参数时效为24hrs，超时请重新取得
th.get_token_for_example: ยกตัวอย่างการรับ Token
th.response_is_json: รูปเเบบส่งกลับเป็นJSON
th.get_example: ตัวอย่าง Get
th.get_gametype_for_example: ยกตัวอย่างการรับ gametype
th.use_token: ป้อนTokenที่ได้รับ
th.request_query_string_help: ใช้วิธีQuery stringเพิ่มเข้าไปที่ท้ายURL
th.get_commission_for_example: ยกตัวอย่างจากกลุ่มค่าคอมในเกม(/game/{lobby}/commission/group)
th.url_parameter_help: ใช้เครื่องหมายวงเล็กในการตั้งค่าตัวเเปรในรูทติ้ง เพื่อเเทนที่ด้วยลิ้งค์เว็บ
